title: Frequently unable to move at all but still connected to the chat server and internet
body: I've been having some problems with the game for almost two months now where I'm unable to move at all, but i can see everything happen around me and type in chat. It usually lasts about 10 or so seconds and happens multiple times during games. Does anybody have any insight on this? If this helps at all, all the commands I put in during this lag becomes a buffered command, so if I click q as lee sin while it's completely unresponsive, my q happens once I'm able to move again.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some input delays caused by a network issue like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also provide a set of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I have the same issue. High fps, low ping, but exactly what you said
